name: Tofu Coconut Curry
details: As a secondary product of soymilk, it comes as no surprise then that tofu has no taste of its own. The overall taste is bland. It has a mild taste strikingly similar to beans. On its own and without forethought

name: Teriyaki Chicken
details: Teriyaki Chicken is ready in about 10 minutes! Made with just basic 5 ingredients you probably have in the kitchen right now! If you like easy pasta salad recipes, you’re going to love today’s new recipe!

name: Pesto Tortellini Salad
details: Pesto Tortellini Pasta Salad is ready in about 10 minutes! Made with just basic 5 ingredients you probably have in the kitchen right now! If you like easy pasta salad recipes, you are going to love today’s new recipe!
